keyMoments.title: Crew Faces Admiral Aokiji
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates face one of their most dangerous opponents yet as Luffy challenges Admiral Aokiji while the crew evacuates with frozen Robin.
keyMoments.significance: A pivotal moment showing the crew's loyalty and willingness to sacrifice for each other, while also highlighting how far they still have to go.

keyMoments.title: Crew Works Together to Save Robin and Luffy
keyMoments.description: The crew demonstrates their teamwork and medical skills as they carefully thaw and resuscitate both Robin and Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the depth of the crew's bonds and their determination to save their nakama no matter the cost.

keyMoments.title: Crew Decides to Recruit Shipwright at Water 7
keyMoments.description: After learning about Water 7 from Kokoro, the crew makes the crucial decision to head there to find a shipwright.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the entire Water 7 Saga and the crew's quest to repair the Going Merry.
